page.title: 03Sports Day In Dundrennan
page.content: For the past 12 years Dundrennan Primary School has held its sports every June in front of Dundrennan Abbey. The children do high jump,long jump,running,skipping,rolling a hoop, bean bag race,sack race,egg and spoon race and an obstacle race.At the end everyone gets an ice cream.There are two cups to be won.These cups have been presented to the school by former pupils. People from the village and nearby farms come to watch the sports,and after the presentation of the cups they have tea and biscuits in the school.
